title: Academic Excellence
description: Discover our comprehensive curriculum designed to inspire and challenge our students to reach their full potential.
curriculumContent:
AIC Sengani Girls High School follows the Kenya Certificate of Secondary Education (KCSE) curriculum, providing a comprehensive education that prepares students for higher learning and future careers. Our academic program is designed to challenge students intellectually while fostering critical thinking, problem-solving, and creativity.

Our dedicated team of qualified teachers employs modern teaching methodologies to ensure effective learning. We maintain small class sizes to allow for personalized attention and support for each student's unique learning needs.

subjectAreas.name: Mathematics
subjectAreas.description: Building strong foundations in mathematical concepts and problem-solving skills.

subjectAreas.name: Sciences
subjectAreas.description: Exploring biology, chemistry, and physics through theoretical learning and practical laboratory work.

subjectAreas.name: Languages
subjectAreas.description: Developing proficiency in English, Kiswahili, and optional foreign languages.

subjectAreas.name: Humanities
subjectAreas.description: Studying history, geography, religious education, and business studies.

subjectAreas.name: Technical Subjects
subjectAreas.description: Offering computer studies, agriculture, and home science.

subjectAreas.name: Creative Arts
subjectAreas.description: Nurturing talent through music and visual arts education.

achievementContent:
AIC Sengani Girls High School has consistently performed well in national examinations, with many of our students qualifying for admission to prestigious universities in Kenya and abroad. Our academic excellence is reflected in our KCSE results, which have shown improvement year after year.

Our students also participate in various academic competitions at county and national levels, including science congresses, mathematics contests, and debate tournaments, where they have won numerous accolades.
